original_text: The Lord says, ‘ Terrible trouble will come to the rulers of my people. They should have taken care of my people, as shepherds take care of their sheep. Instead, they have caused them to run away.’
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 내 목장의 양 떼를 멸하며 흩어지게 하는 목자에게 화 있으리라

sentences.original_text: to the rulers of my people
They should have taken care of my people
as shepherds take care of their sheep
Instead, they have caused them to run away'
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 내 백성을 흩어지게 하였느니라'
